name: Bierens Incasso Game
description:
The Bierens debt collection game is a game where the player experiences how annoying and difficult it is to claim payment from defaulters. The game aims to persuade potential customers of Bierens to enlist their help regarding unpaid bills. This game will present different scenarios to the player in the form of emails containing responses from non-paying companies with levels that can only be solved in 1 way. Namely, ultimately sending an email towards Bierens Incasso Advocaten to bring the case to a successful conclusion. Ultimately, the game will also provide more information about Bierens and the services Bierens can provide to the make life easier for young credit managers/owners working at smaller companies.


This game was made by a group of students at the Fontys University of Applied Sciences and commissioned by Bierens Incasso Advocaten.
